definition: piercing eyes/discerning eyes
fire/urgent/ammunition/fiery or flaming/internal heat (Chinese medicine)/hot (popular)/classifier for military units (old)/Kangxi radical 86
surname Huo
eye/small hole/crux (of a matter)/CL:隻|只[zhi1],雙|双[shuang1]/classifier for big hollow things (wells, stoves, pots etc)
gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
surname Jin/surname Kim (Korean)/Jurchen Jin dynasty (1115-1234)
eye/eyeball

sentences.english: From then on, he had a pair of fire eyes with golden pupils.
sentences.chinese: 從此，孫猴更煉就一雙“火眼金睛”。

sentences.english: Piercing eye cannot see your hypocrisy.
sentences.chinese: 火眼金睛也看不出你的虛僞。

sentences.english: Let's hope the lenses help them see more clearly.
sentences.chinese: 讓我們共同期望隱形眼睛可以幫助她們火眼金睛。

sentences.english: Cannot let everybody refine with respect to piercing eye?
sentences.chinese: 不能讓所有人煉就火眼金睛吧？

sentences.english: You have every little change in our eyes that escape.
sentences.chinese: 你的每一點兒變化都逃不出我們的火眼金睛。

sentences.english: But the courts have been pretty astute at seeing through bogus claims.
sentences.chinese: 但是法庭對於虛假索賠可是有火眼金睛的。

definition: an all-seeing mind/mental perception/insight/acumen
ignoramus (idiom)
lit. seeing clearly the downy feathers of autumn (idiom, from Mencius)/fig. perceptive of even the finest detail
to see everything clearly
to penetrate/to see through
to see through something at first glance (idiom)
sb with preternaturally good hearing (in fiction)/fig. a well-informed person
discerning eye
to possess great magical power/to possess remarkable abilities
magic mirror for revealing goblins/fig. way of seeing through a conspiracy
to cross the sea by a trick (idiom)/to achieve one's aim by underhanded means
Great-Sage Sun/Sun Wukong 孫悟空|孙悟空[Sun1 Wu4 kong1]
to get away with it/to slip through/to bluff one's way out/Taiwan pr. [meng1 hun4 guo4 guan1]
lit. the eyes watch six roads and the ears listen in all directions/to be observant and alert (idiom)
pinyin: yan3 guan1 liu4 lu4 er3 ting1 ba1 fang1

definition: genuine or fake/true or false
see through (a person, scheme, trick etc)
